explains: v. 培养，促进；养育，培育；抱有，怀有；扶持，帮助；滋养，滋生
n. 养育，培育；教养；（总称）环境因素
wordGroup: nature and nurture 先天与后天，遗传与环境；先天遗传说和后天培养说

sentences.en: Parents want to know the best way to nurture and raise their child to adulthood.
sentences.cn: 父母们想了解把他们的孩子养育成人的最好方法。

sentences.en: Like the old song says, there's no place like home, not because of the real estate, but because of the sense of shelter and nurture that it provides.
sentences.cn: 就像古老的歌中所唱，没有地方会像家一样，不是因为它实际的地产价值，而是因为它所提供的庇护和养育的感觉。

sentences.en: Unique to mammals, the limbic cortex impels creatures to nurture their offspring by delivering feelings of tenderness and warmth to the parent when children are nearby.
sentences.cn: 当哺乳动物的孩子们在附近时，独有的边缘皮层向家长传递温柔和温暖的感觉，促使哺乳动物去养育后代。
